short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly insert frequently used prompt phrases in Chatgpt! Just type @{promptname} followed by /

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your ChatGPT experience with Prompt Assistant!

Prompt Assistant is a powerful extension designed to enhance your interactions with ChatGPT by providing quick access to your favorite prompts. Say goodbye to repetitive typing and hello to a seamless chat experience!

Using Prompt Assistant is a breeze:

- Simply type "@" followed by the name of your desired prompt.
- End with a "/" to watch the magic happen!
- For example: "@stevejobs /" instantly inserts the corresponding text for the "stevejobs" prompt.

But that's not all! Prompt Assistant is fully customizable:
- Effortlessly add new prompts that fit your unique needs.
- Edit existing prompts to fine-tune your ChatGPT interactions.
- Manage your prompts with just a click on the extension icon.

Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT with Prompt Assistantâ€”your go-to companion for smarter and faster chatting!
